1.title: Florence Henderson

episode of.title: Breaking Bread with Brooke Burke (TV Series 2015– )

1.plot: Brooke meets up with Florence Henderson ("The Brady Bunch") at her neighborhood Italian restaurant where they enjoy a sumptuous pasta dinner and share stories of Florence's on-and-off-screen families.

2.title: Jane Seymour

episode of.title: Breaking Bread with Brooke Burke (TV Series 2015– )

2.plot: Brooke visits Jane Seymour ("Dr. Quinn, Medicine Woman") at her Malibu home to explore her seaside garden, prepare baked salmon and mushroom risotto, and remember how her mother's wartime struggles influence her life to this day.

3.title: Nicole Ari Parker and Boris Kodjoe

episode of.title: Breaking Bread with Brooke Burke (TV Series 2015– )

3.plot: Brooke joins married couple Nicole Ari Parker and Boris Kodjoe ("Soul Food") at their favorite restaurant to learn to make Brazilian chicken pot pie and chat about the role food plays in keeping their family happy and healthy.

4.title: Carine Wilson

episode of.title: Breaking Bread with Brooke Burke (TV Series 2015– )

4.plot: Brooke goes into the kitchen with Carnie Wilson of the band Wilson Phillips to talk about Carnie's famous family and mix up a pot of her grandmother's chicken matzo ball soup.

5.title: Ali Landry & Alejandro Gomez Monteverde

episode of.title: Breaking Bread with Brooke Burke (TV Series 2015– )

5.plot: Brooke drops in on her good friend Ali Landry (TV's "Eve"), where they reminisce about how cooking played a part in finding love, and they prepare some traditional Mexican fare with Ali's husband, director Alejandro Gomez Monteverde.

6.title: Roma Downey & Mark Burnett

episode of.title: Breaking Bread with Brooke Burke (TV Series 2015– )

6.plot: Brooke and her husband David Charvet invite their close friends Roma Downey ("Touched by an Angel") and Mark Burnett (producer of "The Voice") into their home to fix Brooke's country roasted chicken and share some family holiday traditions.

imdb.title: Breaking Bread with Brooke Burke
akas: Breaking Bread with Brooke Burke (United States)
plot: Brooke Burke joins a celebrity guest at their home or favorite restaurant to explore meaningful meals and memories through the palate, family traditions and sentimental recipes.
